name: Leydig cell tumor
definition: A sex cord-gonadal stromal tumor that secretes testosterone characterized by excessive proliferation of Leydig cells located_in ovary or testicle. [url:https\://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leydig_cell_tumour]

clinicalTrials.title: Cabozantinib in Combination With Nivolumab and Ipilimumab in Rare Genitourinary Tumors
